info.title: Partners API
info.description: Partners API v1 - Clinical workflow management including patients, orders, labs, and documents.

get.description: List all patients with optional filtering and pagination

parameters.name: q
parameters.description: Search query to filter patients by email, firstName, lastName, or phone

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

400.description: Bad Request - Validation error or invalid data

get.description: Get a specific patient by ID

404.description: Not Found - Patient does not exist
Not Found - Patient does not exist

post.description: Upload identity or verification document for a patient

get.description: Get all documents with optional filtering

patch.description: Update document information including verification status

get.description: Shortcut to get all documents for a specific patient. Equivalent to GET /documents?patient_id={id}

post.description: Upload a file (document, lab result, etc.) and receive a secure URL. Use this URL when creating documents or submitting other resources that require file attachments.
Submit a completed questionnaire response for a patient

get.description: Retrieve questionnaire responses with optional filtering
Get all available clinical vertical programs (BH, DERM, SLEEP, etc.)

parameters.name: bundle_code
parameters.description: Filter by clinical vertical bundle code

get.description: Retrieve details of a specific program by its abbreviation ID
Retrieve the questionnaire required for a specific program
Get all products associated with a specific program
Get all available products with optional filtering by program, payment provider, or client

parameters.name: program_id
parameters.description: Filter by program abbreviation (ADHD, MHL, ED, etc.)

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return

products.product_description: Comprehensive ADHD treatment with medication and monthly provider consultations

post.description: Create a patient, questionnaire response, and invoices in one operation

requestBody.description: Funnel response data including patient info and questionnaire answers

get.description: Retrieve all orders with optional filtering

post.description: Create a new order based on patient, product, and questionnaire

get.description: Retrieve a specific order by ID

patch.description: Update an existing order including fulfillment, review, and other fields

get.description: Shortcut to get all lab orders for a specific order. Equivalent to GET /lab-orders?order_id={id}

post.description: Create a new lab order for a patient

get.description: Retrieve all lab orders with optional filtering
Retrieve a specific lab order by ID

patch.description: Update lab order including status, results, and other fields

birth_date.description: Patient's birth date in YYYY-MM-DD format
Patient's birth date in YYYY-MM-DD format

default.description: Whether this is the default address

field.description: Field that caused the validation error

total.description: Total number of items matching the query

limit.description: Maximum number of items returned per page

has_more.description: Whether there are more items available

id.description: Program abbreviation ID (e.g., ADHD, MHL, ED). This is the unique identifier used across the API.

bundle_code.description: Clinical vertical bundle code (e.g., BH for Behavioral Health)

bundle_name.description: Full bundle name for display (e.g., 'Behavioral Health', 'Hair & Dermatologic Health')

offering_name.description: Clinical vertical offering name for display

age_range.description: Target age range if applicable (e.g., '18-65'). Null means no age restriction.

gender.description: Target gender restriction: M (Male only), F (Female only), ALL (any gender), null (no restriction)

product_id.description: Internal OpenLoop product identifier (used for orders and tracking)

payment_provider_product_id.description: Product ID in the payment provider system (e.g., Stripe product ID: prod_xxx, Chargebee plan ID: plan_xxx)

payment_provider_price_id.description: Price ID in the payment provider system (e.g., Stripe price ID: price_xxx)

payment_provider.description: Payment provider system used for billing

program_id.description: Associated program abbreviation (e.g., ADHD, MHL, ED)

active.description: Whether the product is currently active and available for purchase

example.product_description: Comprehensive ADHD treatment with medication and monthly provider consultations

payment_method_id.description: Payment method ID (e.g., Stripe payment method)

is_subscription.description: Whether this is a subscription order

total_amount.description: Total amount in cents (deprecated, use pricing.total)

metadata.description: Additional metadata (payment IDs, campaign info, etc.)

payment_method_id.description: Payment method ID (e.g., Stripe payment method)

metadata.description: Additional metadata (campaign info, partner IDs, etc.)

document_number.description: Document number (e.g., license number, passport number)

verified.description: Whether the document has been verified

verified_by.description: ID of user who verified the document

file_url.description: Secure URL to access the document file
URL to the uploaded document file

verified.description: Whether the document has been verified

verified_by.description: ID of user who verified the document

order_id.description: Associated order ID (if part of an order)

reviewed_at.description: Timestamp when results were reviewed by provider

in_range.description: Whether the result is within normal range

file_url.description: Secure URL to access the uploaded file

file_type.description: MIME type of the uploaded file

program_id.description: Program ID (optional if questionnaire already linked)

answers.description: Question answers as key-value pairs (question_id: answer)

NotFoundError.description: Not Found - Resource does not exist

ValidationError.description: Bad Request - Validation error or invalid data
